commands: set -x
exec > >(tee -a /var/log/datastream-debug.log) 2>&1
echo '=== DEBUG: Environment Information ===' && env | sort && echo '=== END ENV ==='
echo '=== DEBUG: System Information ===' && uname -a && df -h && free -h && echo '=== END SYSTEM ==='
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Starting cleanup" && set -e

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'echo "User: $(whoami), Home: $HOME, PWD: $(pwd)" && rm -rf /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream && docker rmi -f $(docker images -aq)' || { echo "Cleanup failed with code $?"; exit 1; }
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Cloning repository"

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'cd /home/ec2-user && echo "Cloning branch: ${BRANCH_NAME}" && git clone -v -b ${BRANCH_NAME} https://github.com/CIROH-UA/ngen-datastream.git' || { echo "Git clone failed with code $?"; exit 1; }
runuser -l ec2-user -c 'ls -la /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/ && ls -la /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/docker/'
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Building datastream-deps"

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream && ARCH=$(uname -m) && echo "Architecture: $ARCH" && TAG=latest-arm64 docker compose -f /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/docker/docker-compose.yml build --progress=plain --verbose datastream-deps' || { echo "datastream-deps build failed with code $?"; docker images; exit 1; }
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Building datastream"

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream && TAG=latest-arm64 docker compose -f /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/docker/docker-compose.yml build --progress=plain --verbose datastream' || { echo "datastream build failed with code $?"; docker images; exit 1; }
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Building forcingprocessor"

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream && TAG=latest-arm64 docker compose -f /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/docker/docker-compose.yml build --progress=plain --verbose forcingprocessor' || { echo "forcingprocessor build failed with code $?"; docker images; exit 1; }
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Docker images after builds" && docker images
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Starting datastream execution"

runuser -l ec2-user -c 'cd /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream && export DS_TAG=latest-arm64 FP_TAG=latest-arm64 && echo "DS_TAG=$DS_TAG, FP_TAG=$FP_TAG" && ls -la scripts/ && ./scripts/datastream -s 202006200100 -e 202006200200 -C NWM_RETRO_V3 -d /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/data/datastream_test -g https://ngen-datastream.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/palisade.gpkg -R /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/configs/ngen/realization_sloth_nom_cfe_pet.json' || { echo "Datastream execution failed with code $?"; exit 1; }
echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] DEBUG: Final system state" && docker ps -a && docker images && ls -la /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/data/
aws s3 cp /var/log/datastream-debug.log s3://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream/docker_login_log.txt --region us-east-1 || echo 'Failed to upload debug logs'
